items.title: AI’s promise of opportunity masks a reality of managed displacement

items.title: OpenAI’s GPT-5 rollout is not going smoothly
items.description: It also failed on a simple algebra arithmetic problem that elementary schoolers could probably nail, 5.9 = x + 5.11.
